Magic
Spell Slots: C0: 2; C1: 1; K0: 4; K5: 4 Attack: C: 7; K: 8 Spell DC: C: 15; K: 16
Spells:
Animate Dead (K3 [Undying Servitude] Necr): R10' Bones or corpse of a medium or small creature becomes an obedient (R60') skeleton or zombie for 1 dy [+Level animates +2 undead]
Chill Touch (K0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP necrotic and target cannot heal for 1 rd, undead also suffer Disadv on self attack for 1 rd
Cone Of Cold (K5 [The Fathomless] Evoc): 60' cone inflicts 8d8 HP cold (Constitution half) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Detect Poison And Disease (C1 Divi): R30' Self senses poison, poisonous creatures, and diseases for conc up to 10 min [R]
Eldritch Blast (K0 Evoc): R120' Ranged spell creates 4 rays that inflict 1d10 HP force each
Evard's Black Tentacles (K4 [Grasping Tentacles] Conj): R90' 20' sq inflicts 3d6 HP bludgeoning and restrains (Dexterity neg, Strength or Dexterity breaks free) for conc up to 1 min
Find Familiar (K1 [Pact Of The Chain] Conj): R10' Self gains service from a summoned spirit in animal form [R]
Friends (K0 Ench): Self gains on Adv on Charisma w/non-hostile target for conc up to 1 min; target becomes hostile afterward
Hold Monster (K5 Ench): R90' Immobilizes target creature (Wisdom ends) for conc up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Minor Illusion (K0 Illu): R30' Creates the sound of 1 creature or a 5' cube image (Investigation detects) for 1 min
Poison Spray (K0 Conj): R10' Target suffers 4d12 HP poison (Constitution neg)
Sacred Flame (C0 Evoc): R60' Target suffers 4d8 HP radiant (Dexterity neg)
Seeming (K5 [Djinni] Illu): R30' Changes appearance of targets (Charisma neg; Investigation detects) for 8 hr
Sending (K3 [Far Scribe] Evoc): Self may exchange 25-word messages with a known target
Thaumaturgy (C0 Tran): R30' Creates minor magic effects for 1 min
Magic Notes:
Eldritch Invocations: 8 selections
Magic Initiate (Cleric): Knows 2 C0 spells/May cast chosen C1 spell 1/long rest
Bond Of The Talisman: Self or talisman wearer may teleport to the other 6/long rest
Eldritch Master: May recover expended spell slots 1/long rest
Eldritch Mind: Adv on Constitution saves to maintain concentration
Far Scribe: May cast Sending, targeting one of 6 creatures who have written their names in the Book Of Shadows
Fathomless Plunge: R30' May teleport self and 5 willing targets 1 mile to a known body of water 1/short rest
Genie's Vessel: May retreat into vessel (AC 16; HP 26) for 12 hr 1/long rest/May inflict +6 HP cold 1/rd
Gift Of The Protectors: Creatures who have written their names in the Book Of Shadows retain 1 HP when reduced to 0 HP 1/long rest
Grasping Tentacles: May cast Evard's Black Tentacles w/unbreakable concentration and gain 20 temporary HP 1/long rest
Guardian Coil: May use Reaction to reduce damage w/in 10' of Tentacle Of The Deeps by 2d8
Investment Of The Chain Master: Familiar gains 40' fly or swim Speed, gains magical attacks, and inflicts DC 16 saves; self can use a bonus action to command familiar to attack and Reaction to give it resistance to damage
Limited Wish: May gain the effects of a 6th level spell 1/1d4 long rests
Mystic Arcanum: May cast chosen K6, K7, K8, K9 spells 1/long rest
Pact Of The Chain: May cast Find Familiar as a ritual
Pact Of The Tome: Has a Book Of Shadows containing 3 chosen cantrips that can be cast at will
Protection Of The Talisman: Talisman wearer may add +1d4 to a failed save 6/long rest
Rebuke Of The Talisman: R30' When talisman wearer takes damage, may use Reaction to inflict 6 HP psychic and 10' push on attacker
Sanctuary Vessel: R30' May take 5 willing into vessel; 10 min in vessel gives the benefits of a short rest and restores +6 HP
Tentacle Of The Deeps: R60' May use a bonus action to summon a 10' tentacle that moves 30' and inflicts 2d8 HP cold and -10' speed 2/rd for 1 min 6/long rest
Undying Servitude: May cast Animate Dead 1/long rest
Notes
Validation Errors: Selectable Feature Allocation: 11 available vs. 17 allocated
